Html:
Hi,
I got a PNG GIS image that contains depths information over a lake. I have lat,lng for the image corners and want it to be lock to that position and not change scale when zooming the map as in Google Earth.

Does anyone know if this would be possible in GMAP.NET?

Br
Bjorn Kallin

Use Demo.Clouds example. It helps.

Basically
 PointLatLng gtl = new PointLatLng(49.6049, -108.8620);
  PointLatLng gbr = new PointLatLng(27.5238, -68.7547);
where gtl is upperleft corner and gbr is bottom right corner
